General.Name: Distribution Finance Capital Holdings PLC
General.Description: Distribution Finance Capital Holdings plc, an investment holding company, operates as a personal savings and commercial lending bank in the United Kingdom. The company offers working capital funding solutions to dealers and manufacturers. It also provides floorplan finance, unit stocking finance, inventory finance, and rental and hire fleet finance, as well as personal savings products, including fixed rate deposits and notice accounts. The company serves agricultural, industrial, lodges and holiday homes, motorhomes and caravans, marine, specialist cars, and motorcycle sectors. Distribution Finance Capital Holdings plc was founded in 2016 and is based in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: St James? Building, Manchester, United Kingdom, M1 6EJ
